Grab the residuals

grab_resids.Rd

This is a simple function to grab the residuals of a linear model.

grab_resids(lm_obj)

Arguments

lm_obj

the linear model object created by the lm() function.

Examples

library(palmerpenguins)
fit <- lm(bill_length_mm ~ ., data = penguins[, -8])
grab_resids(fit)
